column3: News;Kampot:------ Police received information that a foreigner had died in a Kampot  guesthouse at 12:30 pm on October 20
column6: Kampot City.------The man was identified as an Australian called BARRY GLENN THOMAS.------The office of the technical office and the physician examined  the dead body at about 2:00 pm
column7: and saw the victim was taking diabetes medications and heart drugs. In the past
column8: part of his left foot had been amputated. ------*The article doesn’t state the actual cause
column11: it looks likely it was either from diabetes complications or heart problems.------TVFB
